说明：谨慎修改{}中的内容,避免出现数据异常: Note: Be careful when modifying the content in {} to avoid data anomalies
注：可通过修改“{{}}”中的内容更改时间格式。: Note: You can change the time format by modifying the content in {{}}.
1. 格式“2013-01-01 19:00:00”，输入“单据日期： {{单据: 1. In the format of 2013-01-01 19:00:00, enter Document Date: {{Document Date}};
2. 格式“2013-01-01”，输入“单据日期： {{单据日期_日期}}”；: 2. In the format of 2013-01-01, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Date}};
3. 格式“19:00:00\"，输入“单据日期： {{单据日期_时间}}\"；: 3. In the format of 19:00:00, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Time}};
请输入内容填充内容: Please enter content to fill in the content
说明：所选区域的内容仅打印一次: Note: The content of the selected area is printed only once
说明：所选区域的内容每页均打印: Note: The content of the selected area is printed on each page
出错啦，未识别类型，此信息不应该出现: Something went wrong. The type was not recognized. This message should not appear
单列-总表最后一列: Single column - the last column of the total table
单列-总表下方一行: Single column - one row below the total table
双栏-总表下方一行两栏: Double columns - one row and two columns below the general table
四栏-总表下方一行四栏: Four columns - four columns in one row below the general table
说明：在字段之间自行设置间隔符号,但谨慎修改{}中的内容,避免出现数据异常: Note: Set the separator between the fields, but be careful when modifying the content in {} to avoid data anomalies
说明：选中内容进行编辑，可拖动字段移动位置，右键使用更多功能: Note: Select the content to edit, drag the field to move it, right-click to use more functions
说明：选中内容进行编辑，可拖动字段移动位置，右键使用更多功能，更多详情点击: Note: Select the content to edit. You can drag the field to move it. Right-click to use more functions. For more details, click
注意：开启后签名区域内容会紧跟内容区域，不会一直固定在底部: Note: After it is turned on, the signature area content will follow the content area and will not be fixed at the bottom
注意：填充仅支持单栏数据使用: Note: Filling only supports single column data
行数是否自动填充: Whether the number of rows is automatically filled
商品排列仅适用于双栏商品设置: Product arrangement is only applicable to double column product settings
是否每页显示整单合计: Whether to display the total of the entire order on each page
整行展现的情况下只能选择一个字段: When the entire row is displayed, only one field can be selected
所选择的字段必须是在列表中有配置的才能显示: The selected field must be configured in the list to be displayed
格式“2022-01-01 19:00:00”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期}}: In the format of 2022-01-01 19:00:00, enter Document Date: {{Document Date}};
格式“2022-01-01 19:00”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期_时分}}: In the format of 2022-01-01 19:00, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Hours and Minutes}};
格式“2022-01-01”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期_日期}}”；: In the format of 2022-01-01, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Date}};
格式“01-01 19:00:00”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期_无年份}}”: In the format of 01-01 19:00:00, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_No Year}};
格式“01-01”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期_日期_无年份}}”；: In the format of 01-01, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Date_No Year}};
格式“19:00:00”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期_时间}}”；: In the format of 19:00:00, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Time}};
格式“2022-01-01 星期六”，输入“单据日期：{{单据日期_日期_星期}: In the format of 2022-01-01 Saturday, enter Document Date: {{Document Date_Date_Week}};
合并打印设置只针对自定义字段: Merge print settings only for custom fields
不同项分开打印（分开行打印）: Print different items separately (print in separate lines)
不同项合并打印（打印在一行上）: Print different items together (print them on one line)
分类小计(套账出库金额): Subtotal by category (amount of outgoing goods)
表示该模板是针对单一商户的配送单模板（商户配送单），或是账户合并打印配送单（账户: Indicates that the template is a delivery order template for a single merchant (Merchant Delivery Order) or a template for printing delivery orders for combined accounts (Account Delivery Order)
单列-总表最后一列（换行）: Single column - the last column of the total table (line break)
单列-总表最后一列（不换行）: Single column - the last column of the total table (no line break)
在每列底部展现: Display at the bottom of each column
不连续打印（一张采购单不出现多供应商）: Discontinuous printing (one purchase order does not have multiple suppliers)
连续打印（一张采购单可能出现多个供应商）: Continuous printing (multiple suppliers may appear on one purchase order)
不连续打印（一张采购单不出现多个分类）: Discontinuous printing (one purchase order does not have multiple categories)
连续打印（一张采购单可能出现多个分类）: Continuous printing (multiple categories may appear on one purchase order)
表示该模板是针对单品、组合，或者是包装单据的模板。: Indicates that the template is for a single product, combination, or packing document.
只打印商品基本单位报价: Only print the basic unit price of the product
开启后，无基本单位报价的商品不打印: After it is turned on, products without basic unit quotation will not be printed
每页合计（套账下单金额）: Total per page (amount of order placed)
每页合计（套账出库金额）: Total per page (amount of outgoing goods)
说明：单击选中内容，双击编辑，可拖动以摆放位置，可方向键细调位置，可点击右键删除: Description: Click to select content, double-click to edit, drag to place, use arrow keys to fine-tune the position, right-click to delete
请填写${slot1}，最多不超过10个字: Please fill in ${slot1}, no more than 10 characters
商品单价必须为大于0，小数点后至多${slot1}位的数值: The unit price of the product must be greater than 0 and have at most ${slot1} decimal places.
下单数量必须为大于0，小数点后至多${slot1}位的数值: The order quantity must be greater than 0 and have a maximum of ${slot1} decimal places.
将【${slot1}】的商品单价和定价公式同步至：: Synchronize the product unit price and pricing formula of [${slot1}] to:
